attributes.action: Introduce a community 'Bank of Dave' in every town in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty's Treasury should support the creation of a chain of independent, local banks, with each town having a community bank serving them.

The banks will follow David Fiswick's financial model
http://www.cityam.com/article/bank-dave-two-how-one-man-took-fsa-and-won

5% flat-rate interest for savers.
Finance supporting local businesses and enterprise.
All profit re-invested in local community projects and needs while also creating much needed employment.

Simple, proven, tried and tested model for serving British citizens.
